SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"\cmd-&$RUNID#.txt") : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = "ver" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_PRINTLOG# = "1" : SET &UC4RB_CMD_FILE_PATH# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_RUN_COMMAND@WIN if(!$?) { $errors = 1 }
$count=@( Get-Content "&UC4RB_OUTPUT_LOG#" | Where-Object { $_.Contains("Windows") } ).Count
